snippet: After falling out of an inner tube, the girl was struck by the boat’s propellers.
abstract: Police say 16-year-old girl from Greenwich, Conn, has been killed and another seriously injured in boating accident on Long Island Sound; say after falling out of an inner tube, girls were struck by boat's propellers.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and ELIZABETH MAKER
byline.contributor: Emma G. Fitzsimmons reported from New York and Elizabeth Maker from Greenwich, Conn.

lead_paragraph: After falling out of an inner tube, the girl was struck by the boat’s propellers.

headline.main: Boating With Friends, Girl, 16, Dies in Accident on Long Island Sound
headline.print_headline: Boating With Friends, Girl, 16, Dies in Accident on Long Island Sound
